    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0030309</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030309</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Acción geológica de las aguas subterráneas</string>
            <string language="en">Geological action of subterranean water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologische Tätigkeit des unterirdischen 
Wassers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Action géologique de l'eau souterraine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ação geological da água subterranean</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Azione geologica di acqua sotteranea</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεωλογική ενέργεια του υπόγειου ύδατος</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Explica la acción mecánica y química de las aguas subterráneas. Contiene una ampliación sobre el proceso del modelado kárstico con texto explicativo y una animación.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic explaining the mechanical and chemical action of subterranean water. It has additional information about the process of karstic formation with an explanatory text and an animation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geología</string>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">agua</string>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, welches die mechanische und chemische 
Tätigkeit des unterirdischen Wassers erklärt. Es hat 
zusätzliche Informationen über den Prozeß der karstic Anordnung mit
einem erläuternden Text und einer Animation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet expliquant l'action mécanique et chimique 
de l'eau souterraine. Elle a des informations supplémentaires 
sur le processus de la formation karstique avec un texte explicatif et
une animation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que explica a ação mecânica e química
da água subterranean. Tem a informação adicional sobre o 
processo da formação karstic com um texto explanatório e um 
animation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che spiega l'azione meccanica e chimica 
di acqua sotteranea. Ha informazioni supplementari sul processo 
di formazione karstic con un testo esplicativo e una animazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που εξηγεί τη μηχανική και χημική ενέργεια του 
υπόγειου ύδατος. Έχει τις πρόσθετες πληροφορίες για τη 
διαδικασία του καρστικού σχηματισμού με ένα επεξηγηματικό 
κείμενο και μια ζωτικότητα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">géologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'eau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">água</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biosfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">acqua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιόσφαιρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
